name: Alcatraz Builder
description: Take part in building the monument that made Alcatraz Island a household name!
minimum_requirements: OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8 Processor: 1,3 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256 Mo DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: Compatible DirectX 9.0C

reviews.review_text: Got really monatous after lvl 10, Nothing new, recycled missions and at the start after deliveries it didn't complete the mission so I never was able to finish the game :/  :(

Realy nice tablet game. remembers me on some old games on Win95 times.  This game is not very originial but it makes fun, good sound, ok level design. What is realy nice, are the very good infos in the loading screen between the levels about alcatraz. realy nice historical infos. that makes the game some kind of better (i think)
